movies.Title: Avatar
movies.Plot: A paraplegic Marine dispatched to the moon Pandora on a unique mission becomes torn between following his orders and protecting the world he feels is his home.
movies.Actors: Sam Worthington, Zoe Saldana, Sigourney Weaver

movies.Title: The Breakfast Club
movies.Plot: Five high school students meet in Saturday detention and discover how they have a great deal more in common than they thought.
movies.Actors: Emilio Estevez, Judd Nelson, Molly Ringwald

movies.Title: John Wick
movies.Plot: An ex-hitman comes out of retirement to track down the gangsters who killed his dog and stole his car.
movies.Actors: Keanu Reeves, Michael Nyqvist, Alfie Allen

movies.Title: The Avengers
movies.Plot: Earth's mightiest heroes must come together and learn to fight as a team if they are going to stop the mischievous Loki and his alien army from enslaving humanity.
movies.Actors: Robert Downey Jr., Chris Evans, Scarlett Johansson

movies.Title: Moana
movies.Plot: In Ancient Polynesia, when a terrible curse incurred by the Demigod Maui reaches Moana's island, she answers the Ocean's call to seek out the Demigod to set things right.
movies.Director: Ron Clements, John Musker, Don Hall
movies.Actors: Auli'i Cravalho, Dwayne Johnson, Rachel House

movies.Title: Encanto
movies.Plot: A Colombian teenage girl has to face the frustration of being the only member of her family without magical powers.
movies.Director: Jared Bush, Byron Howard, Charise Castro Smith
movies.Actors: Stephanie Beatriz, María Cecilia Botero, John Leguizamo

movies.Title: Coco
movies.Plot: Aspiring musician Miguel, confronted with his family's ancestral ban on music, enters the Land of the Dead to find his great-great-grandfather, a legendary singer.
movies.Actors: Anthony Gonzalez, Gael García Bernal, Benjamin Bratt

movies.Title: It
movies.Plot: In the summer of 1989, a group of bullied kids band together to destroy a shape-shifting monster, which disguises itself as a clown and preys on the children of Derry, their small Maine town.
movies.Actors: Bill Skarsgård, Jaeden Martell, Finn Wolfhard

movies.Title: Halloween
movies.Plot: Fifteen years after murdering his sister on Halloween night 1963, Michael Myers escapes from a mental hospital and returns to the small town of Haddonfield, Illinois to kill again.
movies.Actors: Donald Pleasence, Jamie Lee Curtis, Tony Moran

movies.Title: Just Go with It
movies.Plot: On a weekend trip to Hawaii, a plastic surgeon convinces his loyal assistant to pose as his soon-to-be-divorced wife in order to cover up a careless lie he told to his much-younger girlfriend.
movies.Actors: Adam Sandler, Jennifer Aniston, Brooklyn Decker

movies.Title: Wrong Turn
movies.Plot: Chris and a group of five friends are left stranded deep in the middle of the woods after their cars collide. As they venture deeper into the woods, they face an uncertain and bloodcurdling fate.
movies.Actors: Eliza Dushku, Jeremy Sisto, Emmanuelle Chriqui
